definition: foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)/old form of modern 英尺[ying1 chi3]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: I am looking for a 4 - by 6 -foot Oriental rug for my reception room.
sentences.chinese: 我在爲我的接待室尋找一塊四呎寬六呎長的東方地毯。

sentences.english: I am looking for a 4 - by 6 -foot Oriental rug for my reception room.
sentences.chinese: 我在爲我的接待室尋找一塊四呎寬六呎長的東方地毯。

sentences.english: Poison Sense. Sense poison in 30-ft. radius .
This is only a two-foot-high tree.
sentences.chinese: 這只不過是一棵一呎高的樹。

sentences.english: The ship is sixty feet in width.
Grease. Makes 10- ft . square or one object slippery.
sentences.chinese: 將10呎方區域或單一物體變得油膩。

sentences.english: Move it out of any confined spaces and give it about a foot all around for proper air circulation.
sentences.chinese: 招出任何密閉空間約一呎，給予適當的空氣流通各地。

sentences.english: When your fastball moves by a foot, that's pretty sexy.
sentences.chinese: 當你的快速球會墜移一呎，真是有夠誘惑。

sentences.english: Some full-round actions don't allow you to take a 5-foot step.
sentences.chinese: 某些整輪動作不允許你進行5呎快步。

sentences.english: In 5-foot-high letters, the flowers spelled out a message.
sentences.chinese: 這些花，用五呎高的字母，拼出主人的心意。

sentences.english: The apartment typical unit size is 2,200 sq. ft.
sentences.chinese: 低密度住宅單位面積均爲2，200平方呎。

sentences.english: Is one square foot more important than one person?
sentences.chinese: 一方平呎的樓宇面積重要過一個人嗎？

sentences.english: Having more length than width; slender.
Yet he manages to jump eight feet, a world record.
sentences.chinese: 但他能跳八呎高，是世界紀綠。

sentences.english: When the boar was a scant seventy-five feet away, he fired.
sentences.chinese: 當野豬離他不到七十五呎的時候，他開了槍。
